title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be set in the list box of the report parameter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a new report parameter and set the Display type as List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again.
5. The default value in the list box should be 'aaa'.
